Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Tasty! But, as most cases in Amsterdam - the portions of the bagel is quite small and the price is high... At least add some vegetables on the side or add a small drink, guys! If it were ‚Ç¨2-‚Ç¨3 cheaper, I'd eat there regularly.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Nice place for small meetings or reading with coffee or tea. I tried a Bagels a couple of times; the taste was nice and fresh.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Nice place for breakfast and lunch. Bagels are very fresh and all the ingredients are good quality. The service is quite fast compared to other Dutch bars. Ideal for a quite lunch bite. Prices are avarage Amsterdam prices.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere, has outdoor seating.  Food and drink quality is great, prices are very reasonable.  Service was friendly and fast. Convenient location for local offices.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Friendly staff and nice shpere. Kaneel bagel is definately recomended. Milky oolong tea is also nice and unique

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Wonderful crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside bagels. Also available as a sandwich. Can choose salads as well. Massive cappuccino hahaha. Lots of options to grab and go or sit and enjoy. A very nice and consistent chain.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Really nice bagels and wide selection and food and drinks. They have some seating outside too.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: This place is disgusting in several ways. The managers seem incredibly rude in the way they talks about the employees (in public for all the guests to hear!). He actually made an employee cry in front of the customers! Apart from this, the ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Friendly staff and delicious bagels as usual! Came here 2 days in a row during my stay in Amsterdam .

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text:
The food got worse. They now put less stuff and cream cheese. So you eat almost bread only. Before the corona, it was a great place with delicious food. And they have no more date cake.
Sanitary  conditions I think not good also.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: This is one of my favorite B&B stores because it's spacious and light. There's also a parking lot nearby. And the food is great as always!

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: They just opened.  Great terrace, good food for reasonable prices.  Great coffee and fresh juices.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Good food, but not the best. Not so friendly stuff

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Just perfect, tasty bagels (glutenfree buns available)and healthy juices üòç

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: My spouse and I who have been vegan since 1991 and 1990 respectively, love this place. They are always willing to make items vegan and they now have a vegan pecan pie that is to die for. We have even brought a whole pie to our place of ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Very nice place, friendly staff, good service

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Very nice bagels! Good drinks too. On sunny days it is really nice to sit outside. They also have a lot of space inside to work and they don‚Äôt mind you working there. Not the friendliest service though.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: The food is good and the place is spacious. They have a high chair if you want to bring your child and also lots of space for strollers. However, they are pretty slow. I come here frequently and often wait 20 minutes or more for food, which ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Nice bagel options including vegan or vegetarian. Lots of teas, chai, healthy smoothies and coffees. Some healthy choices of cakes. Good service

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Excellent food, tasty, and excellent staff. The muffins are great! A business with a conscious that made me feel happy to spend money there. Great work environment that you can spend some time in. Unfortunately they close at 6pm

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: We discovered this place on our second day in Amsterdam and we absolutely loved it .Fresh, tasty food, delicious teas, great outside seating area to enjoy the weather. The best part of our visits to Bagels and Beans was our server Avie. She ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Ordered a BLT bagel and got handed someone else's order. Went back to explain it at the counter and got greeted with a very rude lady who made it look like it was my fault. Gave out a huge sigh then shouted to make another BLT bagel. She ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: An absolute delight. Bookended our holiday with it. Excellent food, good cup of coffee, lovely friendly staff and a chilled out atmosphere. Pretty good value for the area as well. Would reccomend in place of the breakfasts at the surrounding hotels

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Very child friendly place if you want to visit with kids. Thanks to large interior, young kids enjoy walking around. Also it is not crowded in general so perfect office if you need to work.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Nice healthy bagels. The service is really really slow though. It can sometimes takes more than 30 minutes to get served here. If your keep that in mind it's really great. The food is fresh made and you can really taste it. There is payed parking though, 3 Euro per hour of you come by car. Otherwise Amsterdam Rai is really close by.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Nice lunchroom with fresh biological products. Bit expensive for what you get though. Good place to do some work enjoying a coffee without being bothered to much. It's Amsterdam so be prepared to be served in English. Dutch probably will be the second choice.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Good food, nice atmosphere.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Friendly staff and nice set up, but chronically understaffed, tables sit there with uncleared dirty dishes for a very long time (20 minutes or more) also service is slow (waited 10 mins for food), and it wasn‚Äôt even peak hour. The place is ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Long waiting line, the waitresses are either inexperienced or always frowning (if you don't like your job, just quit), the way owners include themselves in the business is weird and unprofessional. I saw the wife yell at a teenage girl the other day in the middle of everyone, tell me how this is okay...

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Very tasty coffee and muffin

Name: Bagel & Beans

Review Text: Nice restaurant with large windows (from top to bottom), which makes it spacious visually. Also, when sunny, you can sit outside. During lunch time on business days it is crowded. But before and after and on weekends it's a nice place to ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: The best Bagels, üòç Great service too we were offered a seat while waiting on our takeaway order and then the lovely waitress brought us a sample shot of a smoothie too. The Bagel was amazing great veggie options !!

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Omg you guys.. You NEED to try their Melted Tuna bagel..periodt.. This is the thing I miss the most from Amst!! (Except the huge spliffs lol)

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: A mix between a cafe and a sandwich place, I feel like Bagels & Beans is struggling to have an identity.  It's not warm and comfortable like a cafe, but it's not fast food like I'd expect from a sandwich shop. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Uber delivery packing is bad, bagels are not wrapped, they are flying inside the boxes so they come smashed wet and cold

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: The place is very neat and cozy. But waiting almost 20 minutes for a coffee and a bagel in an almost empty place is not acceptable. And it has happened more than once. Awful service.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Low quality coffee, rude people, basic products.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Nice place, comfortable and well decorated. Bagels are very good, a lot of choices vegan, vegetables! Great time there :)

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Nice and relaxing place conceived to begin your day in a wonderful way. Very spacious place with smart forniture, very nice people, gentle and outstanding classical music, a wonderful cappuccino not to speak of the rest. If you are in ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Super nice cozy place. Friendly staff and great fresh bagels. Great place to work and lunch. Superfast WiFi.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Expect expensive choices as it is in a business area. Quick servants, delicious food and they have a terras for when the sun shines. Mostly used by business lunches and regular meetings from near companies.

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: Don‚Äôt go here if you‚Äôre really hungry. Only choose this place if you have about 3 hours to wait for a bagel. They get your order wrong , get you the wrong bagel, pitiful drinks. Just nope!

Name: Bagel & Beans

Name: Bagel & Beans
Review Text: nice open space with great bagels.  closest you can get to the real thing in Amsterdam.  Service is always friendly and prompt.

Name: Bagel & Beans

Name: Bagel & Beans
